name: Guns N' Roses
description:
Controls:

Walk - A/D

Jump - Left click and hold to set force and change direction, release to jump

Shoot Seed - Right Click

Restart Level - R

Go to last check point - C

You have 10 seeds that will be reset at every check point.

You are a little grasshopper trapped in a rose bush and trying to make your way out. Use your gun to shoot seeds to grow roses to use as your platforms. Watch out for bees and thorns (the thorns on the roses are friendly so don't worry about them), you can weaponize the roses and take out the bees .

This game was created in 7 days for the Week Sauce April 2022 Game Jam.

The theme was to choose a musical group and turn their name into the theme, so we chose Guns 'N Roses.

Credits:

Coding - Mike

Art - Diana, Mike

Sound - Mike

Game Testing - Sheila
